name: Animal Revolution
description:
Pixel Art Tycoon freely inspired on George Orwell Animal Farm. Manage resources and followers in the battle for power in the animal country.

Last Version Fixes

- Fixed a bug with the click on menus and the mouse scroll on screen
- fixed some minor spelling and grammar errors
- Fixed 2 tutorial errors, the esc error and the reproduction house tutorial error, now you need to construct the house to advance in the tutorial.
- Fixed the +5 button error on the Plantation
- Fixed the lose election animation
- Fixed the game over animation
